misc.additional info: We have re-implemented the fast.ai techniques detailed in their 2018-04-20 submission to DAWNBench with progressive image sizes and a more aggressive learning rate schedule.
misc.warmUp: The learning rate starts at 0, then it increases linearly per iteration for the first 4 epochs
misc.evalBatchSize: When reproducing the result, please pass in --eval_batch_size=1000 to the benchmark script. The default value of 1024 skips the last 848 images in the evaluation set.
